Authorization of appropriations for the Missing Children's Assistance Act amended to include $2,500,000 for fiscal years 2001 through 2003. SEC. 7. Special study and report required. The Administrator of the Office of Juvenile Justice and Delinquency Prevention will conduct a study within 1 year to identify obstacles in recovering missing young adults. A report summarizing the study's results will be submitted to the House and Senate Judiciary Committees within 2 years. SEC. 8. REPORTING REQUIREMENT.
